author.8: Matt Hanson, Becky Scarrott, Lance Ulanoff, Tom Power, Christian Guyton, Julian Benson, Mark Wilson, Al Griffin, Matt Evans

title.0: NVIDIA RTX 4070 Ti leaks reveal specs and potential price
title.2: Nvidia CES 2023 live: will we see the rumored RTX 4070 Ti?
title.3: Nvidia may be mulling an RTX 4080 price cut, but not because of AMD, it swears
title.4: CES 2023: what to expect from the world’s largest electronics expo in January
title.5: Nvidia’s powerful RTX 40-series GPUs are coming to pricey laptops in February
title.6: NVIDIA brings GeForce RTX 40 graphics to laptops
title.7: Razer expands to 16- and 18-inch Blade laptop models
title.8: TechRadar's year in review: 2022 in phones, TVs, computing and more
title.10: CES 2023 Day 0 recap: All the early news you missed
title.11: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX GPU proves mixed bag for content creators
title.12: Nvidia RTX 4090 Ti GPU spotted on Galax website – but don’t get your hopes up
title.13: Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti could arrive soon – but Team Green needs a Christmas miracle
title.14: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT / XTX review: 4K performance for less
title.15: Nvidia GeForce RTX 4080 review: Second only to the 4090—for now
title.16: Nvidia makes the RTX 4070 Ti official for $100 less than the canceled 12GB 4080
title.17: 2022 in GPUs: The shortage ends, but higher prices seem here to stay
title.18: Nvidia throws shade at AMD drivers as RDNA 3 GPUs are launched
title.19: A quick look at AMD’s Radeon RX 7900 XTX, which is smaller than an RTX 4080
title.20: So-called 'gaming Chromebooks' are a con – here's why - TechRadar

description.0:
NVIDIA
 is expected to reveal its GeForce RTX 4070 Ti graphics card at CES next week, but it preemptively leaked the specs. Thanks to new rumors, we have a sense of the GPU's likely price too.The RTX 4070 Ti is slated to have 12GB of GDDR6X memory with 7,680…
description.1: How did Nvidia fare over the past year? Strap yourself in tight, because the ride’s a bumpy one…
description.2: Nvidia is at CES 2023 and our live blog will bring you all of the big announcements as they come! Will we see the RTX 4070 Ti?
description.3: The AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX might be just what gamers need to bring down the soaring price of graphics cards, whether you're Team Red or not.
description.4: We’ve collated all the most important information about next year’s CES trade show, from details on its dates, hours and exhibitor list to our own predictions as to what we might see showcased at the event.
description.5: Nvidia announced that its GeForce RTX 4070, 4080, and 4090 graphics cards have been squeezed into 2023 gaming laptops. Look forward to seeing them in laptops from Alienware, Dell, Razer, and more.
description.6: It didn't take long for NVIDIA's GeForce RTX 40 graphics to reach portable PCs. The company has introduced RTX 40 GPUs for laptops that promise large leaps in performance, even in lower-end systems. The flagship RTX 4080 and 4090 GPUs are reportedly powerful …
description.7: Razer has teased its latest laptop creations, the Blade 16 and the Blade 18. The numbers indicated the size of their respective screens, and each model supports up to Intel’s Core i9 HX processor and Nvidia’s RTX 4090 GPU.
description.8: TechRadar's editors and writers look back on the big news and product launches of 2022, and look forward to what 2023 will bring.
description.9: While not perfect, the AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX is still the enthusiast graphics card that matches the moment.
description.10: CES is back! For real. Sort of. While the show has never actually gone away in spirit, this year is the first time since the pandemic that Engadget has a team on the ground. The show proper kicks off on Thursday Jan 5th, but the news has already been coming h…
description.11: The AMD Radeon RX 7900 XTX GPU has been benchmarked - and the results make grim reading for content creators.
description.12: This is an interesting one, with Galax mistakenly sticking up a banner bearing a 4090 Ti HOF graphics card.
description.13: If the RTX 4070 Ti is out in a month, will Nvidia take the opportunity to price the graphics card competitively?
description.14: AMD is back with new RDNA 3 GPUs to take on Nvidia’s RTX 40-series. The Radeon RX 7900 XTX manages to beat Nvidia’s RTX 4080, all at $200 less.
description.15: In a world where you could buy one at $1,200, it would be a good deal.
description.16: Specs and performance are identical to Nvidia's "unlaunched" 4080 variant.
description.17: Intel Arc joins the fray, and Nvidia charges big money for big performance.
description.18: You might recall that Nvidia and AMD were butting heads over driver quality earlier this year, too.
description.19: We can't talk about performance yet, but these GPUs should fit in most PC cases.
description.20: So-called 'gaming Chromebooks' are a con – here's why  TechRadar
